div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 559 Bakërr (anc. Apollonia), 11 km. W of Fier, Albania, 1969 Burial: before 168 B.C. (T) Contents: 441 AR. Pot hoard Thasos: 3 spread-flan tetradr. Apollonia: 133 dr.; 4 hemidr. Dyrrhachium: 107 dr.; 8 hemidr. Cassope: 2 dr. (as Franke, p. 76, no. 68 [1], V 39-R 65 [1]) Epirote Rep.: 5 didr. 88 dr. (Zeus/eagle) 46 dr. (Zeus and Dione/ful- men) 41 hemidr. Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: Tiranë Ceka, Studia Albanica 1972, no. pp. 49-68, illus.
